title: Analysis of a log function with rational argument part - c

content.question: At what values of x does f have a relative maximum or a relative minimum? For each such x, use the first derivative test to determine whether f(x) is a relative maximum or a relative minimum.

frqParts.text: At what values of x does f have a relative maximum or a relative minimum? For each such x, use the first derivative test to determine whether f(x) is a relative maximum or a relative minimum.

topic.text: 2.7: Derivatives of cos x, sin x, ex, and ln x

skill.text: Skill 2.E: Describe the relationships among different representations of functions and their derivatives.
